data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Bareilly.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 48,932 believers in Bareilly to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Rajput (Muslim traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Rajput (Muslim traditions) people.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Bareilly a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, please defend the 48,932 believers in Bareilly against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

location.name: Bareilly
location.people_groups_list: Gadaria Dhingar, Brahmin Sanadhya, Jat Dhankar, Gadaria Nikhad, Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gadaria Dhingar (1,188,000), Brahmin Sanadhya (2,706,000), Jat Dhankar (48,000), Gadaria Nikhad (1,373,000), Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) (1,100)
